demolition

类 Enemies

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.Guy
      • demolition.Enemies
  • 直接已知子类:
    RedEnemies, YellowEnemies

    public abstract class Enemies
extends Guy

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      boolean beKilled
      The survival status of the enemy, if the value is true, the enemy is killed.
      boolean canMove
      Whether the enemy can move (whole), the default is true
      boolean canMoveDown
      Whether the enemy can move (down), the default is true
      boolean canMoveLeft
      Whether the enemy can move (left), the default is false
      boolean canMoveRight
      Whether the enemy can move (right), the default is false
      boolean canMoveUp
      Whether the enemy can move (up), the default is false
      boolean enemyMoveDown
      The enemy's current face (down), the default is true
      boolean enemyMoveLeft
      The enemy's current face (left), the default is false
      boolean enemyMoveRight
      The enemy's current face (right), the default is false
      boolean enemyMoveUp
      The enemy's current face (up), the default is false
      int nextX
      The x value of the enemy's next position (under the assumption that there is no obstruction)
      int nextY
      The y value of the enemy's next position (under the assumption that there is no obstruction)

      • 从类继承的字段 demolition.Guy

        moveDown, moveLeft, moveRight, moveUp, SECONDS_BETWEEN_RENDERED, sprite, sprite1, sprite2, sprite3, sprite4, spriteDown1, spriteDown2, spriteDown3, spriteDown4, spriteLeft1, spriteLeft2, spriteLeft3, spriteLeft4, spriteRight1, spriteRight2, spriteRight3, spriteRight4, spriteUp1, spriteUp2, spriteUp3, spriteUp4, x, y

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Enemies()
      Constructor for a enemy
      Enemies(int x, int y)
      Constructor for a enemy, requires the location of the bombGuy (X and Y value)

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void beKilled(App app)
      This method is used to determine whether the enemy is within the explosive range of the bomb If it is, the enemy is killed (removed from the enemy list)
      abstract void direction(App app)
      This method sets the enemy's image displayed in the app according to the enemy's current facing state The default facing is downward
      abstract void enemiesCanMove(App app)
      The method determines whether can move in a straight line
      void killBombGuy(App app)
      This method is used to determine whether the enemy has collided with BombGuy (that is, at the same position as BombGuy) If so, the enemy will kill bombGuy (bombGuy loses one life)
      abstract void removeEnemy(App app)
      This method is used to remove enemies When an enemy is killed, remove the enemy from the enemy list
      void tick(App app)
      This method is used for enemies to move over time Different types of enemies have different movement patterns Only when it is determined that the enemy can move (that is, there are no obstacles)

      • 从类继承的方法 demolition.Guy

        canMove, draw, drawGuy, getX, getY

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • enemiesCanMove

        public abstract void enemiesCanMove(App app)
        The method determines whether can move in a straight line
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program

      • direction

        public abstract void direction(App app)
        This method sets the enemy's image displayed in the app according to the enemy's current facing state The default facing is downward
        指定者:
        direction 在类中 Guy
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program

      • removeEnemy

        public abstract void removeEnemy(App app)
        This method is used to remove enemies When an enemy is killed, remove the enemy from the enemy list
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program

      • tick

        public void tick(App app)
        This method is used for enemies to move over time Different types of enemies have different movement patterns Only when it is determined that the enemy can move (that is, there are no obstacles)
        指定者:
        tick 在类中 Guy
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program

      • killBombGuy

        public void killBombGuy(App app)
        This method is used to determine whether the enemy has collided with BombGuy (that is, at the same position as BombGuy) If so, the enemy will kill bombGuy (bombGuy loses one life)
        参数:
